card.note: You will both change. /RIt's inevitable. /RBut change is good. /RGive each other the space /Rto grow in your love.
card.author: Jennifer Markas

card.note: Remember to kiss when you wake up and before you go to bed.
card.author: Jennifer Markas

card.note: Jonathan,/RSepi is always right except when she is wrong. She will most likely never admit that she is wrong. So she is always right ;-)
card.author: Jennifer Markas

card.note: Do not lose sight of your passions and hobbies. Just because you're married doesn't mean you have to stay home and be boring :-)
card.author: Jennifer Markas

card.note: Jonathan, /RSepi is a great travel partner to visit Vegas with. She'll be your Lady Luck and stay out with you all night!
card.author: Jennifer Markas

card.note: Be honest with each other. /RIt never works when you hold back - that goes for feelings, love and in the bedroom. /R/RJohnathan- make sure she knows she is always the pretties in the room./R/Rxoxoxo
card.author: HRH Danny Fisk

card.note: Love and Laughter. All you need and you already have it!
card.author: Always, Sarah and Eric

card.note: Start each day with a smile and a kiss./R(And Jonathan, make sure Sepi has her coffee!)
card.author: Sarah

card.note: Jonathan,/RJewelry goes a long way. /RLike miles ;-)
card.author: Jennifer

card.note: Ask your parents how they've done it all these years. You are both very blessed with amazing role models.
card.author: Jennifer

card.note: Hugs and kisses. Keep the conversation going. Always share. Say I love you. Never wear flannel pajamas xoxoxox/R/R
card.author: Michelle Loveall

card.note: I was forced to do this.
card.author: Shannen Eshaghian

card.note: LETS. NOT. SLEEP. ... LETS GO TO CANADA!!!!!!
card.author: Shannen the Great, N.P.

card.note: Give us grandchildren ASAP!!!!!
card.author: Mina & Aziz Eshaghian

card.note: Love and protect each other forever. That is the most important thing to remember.
card.author: Mina & Aziz Eshaghian

card.note: J, how to stop Sepideh's whining: 1. Tell her Starbucks is nearby 2. Play her a puppy video 3. Give her dark chocolate 4. Buy her shoes 5. Show her something shiny 6. Tell her you have super secret gossip. 7. Let her know that I'm on my way there to kick her ass
card.author: Shannen Eshaghian

card.note: Sepi & Jonathan,/RHappy marriages are built by listening to each other, lounging poolside, sipping margaritas and singing along to the Coyote Ugly or Sgt. Pepper albums. /RWishing you a lifetime of happiness!
card.author: Zoe

card.note: It's been a full ten days that we're married so we feel comfortable sharing this - things aren't always perfect but as long as you have each other it's pretty damn close!
card.author: Ellana and Jeffrey

card.note: I'm so lucky to have been upfront and center on your amazing journey...you're both very special people and together shine brighter than ever! Trust in the direction you will take and things will unfold naturally...
card.author: Ellana and Jeffrey

card.note: If you can handle a five floor walk up, especially with luggage, you've got this!
card.author: With love, Tanya and Sam

card.note: The great secret of successful marriage is to treat all disasters as incidents and none of the incidents as disasters.
card.author: Georgiana Artemis Nikias

card.note: Cook together and laugh! Lots of love to you both!
card.author: Dara & Matt Slevin

card.note: Remember all the reasons you decided to spend your lives together and share sweet thoughts with each other regularly.
card.author: Elizabeth and Eric

card.note: Sepi (& Jonathan), /R/RTo someone who is exactly my kind of crazy. I can't believe how far we've come since honors bio. Wishing you & Jonathan all the blessings that life has to offer and more! I'm so luck to get to witness your wild ride. /R/RSo much love & nachus,
card.author: Lexi (& Deb)

card.note: Sepi it brings my heart so much joy to see you happy and in love. I can't wait to see what adventures you and Jonathan will have for years to come. Wishing you both endless bliss, laughter and love.
card.author: Jennifer Markas
